jalse.actions

Class AbstractActionEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • jalse.actions.AbstractActionEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionEngine
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ForkJoinActionEngine, ThreadPoolActionEngine

    public abstract class AbstractActionEngine
extends java.lang.Object
implements ActionEngine
    An abstract implementation of ActionEngine that is designed to be used with ExecutorService. This is a convenience class for creating an ActionEngine.

    If the engine is paused the incoming resumed state change can be awaited ( awaitResumed()).
    Author:
    Elliot Ford
    See Also:
    TERMINATION_TIMEOUT, DefaultActionBindings

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executorService
      Executor service to be used for action scheduling.
      static long TERMINATION_TIMEOUT
      How long the engine will wait until it times out and interrupts running threads on shutdown (configured via jalse.actions.termination_timeout system property).

    • Constructor Summary

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Description copied from interface: ActionEngine
        Permanently stops the engine. All work that has not yet been executed will be cancelled and all work currently executing will may be interrupted.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface ActionEngine
        See Also:
        JALSEExceptions.ENGINE_SHUTDOWN
